text: a l laoh chea anak del banhchoun khyal ruoch trong thveu aoy popk rsat haey trong pongreay vea peasapenh phtaimekh tam avei del trong mean chetnea promteang trong ban thveu aoy vea tow cheadom pelnoh anak nung kheunh phlieng chenhpi chanloh robsa vea . haey nowpel na del trong ban sraochasrap vea towleu anaknea del trong mean chetnea knong chamnaom khnhom teanglay robsa trong pelnoh puokke sabbayrikreay yeang khlang
